Name: Disco Time 80s VR
About the game: Its Disco Time. The 80s are back! Enter the Dancefloor and celebrate an 80s club party in VR. Features 18 80s Style Music Tracks or use The InGame YouTube Browser 3 Clubs + Miami Style Street with entrances to the clubs Interaction: Ask a Dancer for a dance, you can choose between 20 dance styles 7 Various effects like Slow Motion, Neon, Fog, Alcohol, Drawing and more Fun Games like Dart, Bowling, Mini Basketball, Pool Billiard and Arcade Machine Teleportation and Free (Slide) Locomotion VR
